content: कौशिक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (की|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [कुश-ठञ्, कुशिक-अण् वा] {@--1@} Incased, sheathed. {@--2@} Coming from an owl. {@--3@} Born of the family of Kuśika. {@--4@} Silken. --कः {@--1@} An epithet of विश्वामित्र <ab>q. v.</ab> {@--2@} An owl; <ls>U. 2. 29.</ls> {@--3@} A lexicographer. {@--4@} Marrow. {@--5@} Bdellium. {@--6@} An ichneumon. {@--7@} A snakecatcher. {@--8@} The sentiment of love (शृंगार). {@--9@} One who knows hidden treasures. {@--10@} An epithet of Indra; <ls>N. 5. 64.</ls> {@--11@} An epithet of Śiva. --का A cup, drinking vessel. --की {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of a river in Behār. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of the goddess Durgā. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of one of the four varieties of dramatic style; सुकुमारार्थसंदर्भा कौशिकी तासु कथ्यते; see <ls>S. D. 411</ls> {%et seq.%} also.
